displayName.schinese: 邪能墨水都清理干净了吗？

description.tchinese: 在地下探險中擊敗最終Boss

displayName.japanese: 間違いなく倒したはず...だって？

description.english: Defeat the Final Final Boss in Drawn Below

description.tchinese: 在地下探險中擊敗最終Boss

displayName.tchinese: 你發現了所有隱藏物品！

description.english: Collect 100% of the items in Drawn Below

description.french: Récupère 100 % des objets de Desseins maléfiques

description.tchinese: 在地底探險中收集100%隱藏物品

displayName.english: How Could You Be So Heartless
displayName.japanese: なんと心ないことを言うんだ

description.english: Finish Drawn Below without collecting heart containers
description.german: Schließe Strich für Strich ab, ohne Herzcontainer einzusammeln.
description.french: Termine Desseins maléfiques sans récupérer de cœurs
description.italian: Completa Tratto in inganno evitando di raccogliere i contenitori di cuori
description.koreana: 하트 컨테이너를 찾지 않고 그림 함정 완료
description.spanish: Completa Un viaje a las tinieblas sin recoger todos los contenedores de corazón.
description.schinese: 不收集红心的情况下打通地底冒险
description.tchinese: 不收集紅心的情況下打通地底冒險
description.russian: Пройдите Drawn Below, не собирая сердца
description.japanese: ハートのコンテナを集めず「描かれた闇の世界」をクリアしよう
description.portuguese: Termine Drawn Below sem coletar caixas de coração.

displayName.japanese: ハードコア・ヒーロー

description.tchinese: 困難模式下通關地底冒險

description.english: Complete the Lockbox Gauntlet in Drawn Below without taking damage
